transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, good noon Vinod ji.
Customer: Haan, Saurabh ji baat kar rahe Krishna Plant House se.
Executive: Vinod baat kar raha tha Krishna Plant House se.
Executive: Okay. Sir, main Kajal baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART office se Malvika ki manager. Actually, Malvika se subah aapki baat ho rahi thi na?
Customer: Haan, meri baat hui thi.
Executive: Ji, woh bataya sir.
Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Ek toh mujhe tenders mein issue aa raha tha.
Executive: Okay. Tenders mein kya issue aa raha hai? Sir, aapko idea hai ya phir main guide kar doon tenders ke regarding aapko?
Customer: Tenders ke regarding Malvika ji ne kaha tha ki main 12:00 baje aapki meeting lungi Google Meet pe.
Executive: Video meeting?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Accha, aawaz bahut slow aa rahi hai. Main samajh nahi pa raha hoon. Kya keh rahe ho sir aap?
Customer: Maine kaha 12:00 baje Malvika ji ke saath meri woh hai Google Meet pe meeting hai tenders ke regarding.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. Accha meeting hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Dusri problem kya hai? Jab se maine IndiaMART Hello.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jab se maine IndiaMART ka package liya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Tab se hamare paas koi visitor nahi aaya jo aake hame offline training de sake.
Executive: Sir, dekho main aapko chart hi deti hoon. Jinse aapne yeh package purchase kiya tha na, shayad unke manager Arif hai. Unka unse matlab aap yeh maan ke chalo registration hone ke baad.
Executive: Aur saari cheezein complete hone ke baad aapki jo company hai na, matlab aapki kya pan India level pe woh company jo hai woh IndiaMART ke head office mein aa jaati hai which is in Noida. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Noida mein hamara head office hai. Kyunki hamari services online hai isliye jo bhi services hoti hai na jo aapko guide karna hai, training karni hai even discussions karne hai woh sab sirf do hi mode se hote hai ya toh telephonic hoga ya video meeting ke through hoga. Koi bhi visit commit nahi karta hai. Agar aapko visit commit ki gayi hai toh aap woh cheez batao toh main aapke jo matlab sales person the unse ek baar yeh baat kar loon. Other than that visit hoti hi nahi hai. Toh woh cheez hum commit bhi nahi karenge sir. Hum saari cheezein aapko video meeting pe hi guide kar payenge.
Customer: Yeh aise toh hai nahi ki visit na ho. Maine socha hai nahi ki visit na ho. Isliye toh humne IndiaMART ka package liya hai.
Executive: Nahi sir, aisa hai. Nahi nahi, aisa hai sir. Visit nahi hoti hai. Pan India level pe hamari branches hai. Woh branches mein saare naye customer se discussions hote hai. Servicing ke liye sirf aur sirf hum training jo hai woh offline hi dete online hi dete hai sorry. Aur koi location aisi hogi jahan pe agar maan lete hai hamari team available hai toh woh bahut rare case hai ki available hai. Filhaal jo aapki location hai na UP mein wahan pe visit provide nahi hoti sir.
Customer: Kyunki pehle jo hamare registered company thi, jahan pe services the.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wahan pe bhi IndiaMART ka package milta tha hamara.
Executive: Sir, jaise maine aapko bataya ki agar location pe hum aate hai maine woh company ke baare mein suna tha Malvika ji ne mujhe bataya tha. Agar jaise Malvika abhi bhi Arif ji se aapki baat cheet ho rahi hai na toh ab woh aapki aur Arif ki understanding hai. Agar Arif aapko baat karke Arif aapko bolne pe aa ja rahe hai visit karne woh aapka aur unka look out hai. But jo company Krishna Plant House mein landscaping specifically assigned hai handle karne ke liye woh Malvika Tiwari ko assigned hai aur Malvika ki manager main hoon Kajal. Toh agar hamare side se koi bhi help rahegi kyunki obviously service ki puri service ke samjhane ki, batane ki, discuss karne ki, issue resolve karne ki zimmedari hamari hai for now. Correct? Toh hame koi bhi information leni hogi aapko koi bhi right information leni hai aur humse baat cheet karni hai woh sab hum online hi kar payenge. Other than that offline baat karke agar aap Arif wagera ko bol sakte hai ki aa jaaye nahi aa jaaye woh aapka aur Arif ka look out hai. Usme IndiaMART mein meri jaise ki hum kuch nahi kar sakte na hi hum hum even Arif ko bol bhi nahi sakte ki woh kar le visit.
Customer: Thik hai, main samajh gaya baat yeh.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ab yeh tenders ka hamare jo tenders ka option hai isme aap mujhe ek cheez aur bata dijiye. Yeh tenders ka option hai na isme?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Actually tender ka pura template main batati hoon. Ek pura woh hota hai heading hoti hai aapki tenders ki. Jab aap us pe jaate hai aapko saare tenders dikh jaate hai saari details ke saath. Aap unko consume karte hai. Jaise aap us tender ko use karenge na sir aapke mail pe saari information aa jayegi even lead manager pe bhi aapke woh PDF aa jayega. Toh jo registry aapke mail pe saari information aayegi PDF usme saari guidelines hoti hai ki aapko tenders kaise file karna hai, kahan apply karna hai pura process ka A to Z wahan pe aapko pata chal jayega. Aur woh detailed discussion 12:00 baje video meeting hai na usme ek baar main bhi join kar lungi toh video meeting mein main aapko explain kar dungi dikha ke saari cheezein.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Abhi in dono cheezon ke alawa aapka koi concern hai sir?
Customer: Abhi toh koi concerns nahi hai. Aap aise bata dena aap.
Executive: Okay, no issues. Aapko agar koi bhi abhi tenders ke liye hum 12:00 baje video meeting mein connect kar lenge. Other than that uske baad kabhi bhi koi concern aata hai na toh aap Malvika ko ya mujhe call back kar lijiyega. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, 12:00 pe aap raheiyega sir, phir hum connect kar lenge ek baar video meeting pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you sir. Thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issue with tenders.

- No visitor for offline training since package purchase.



Resolution:

- Explained tenders process and PDF guidelines.

- Clarified IndiaMART's online-only service policy.

- Offered to join 12:00 video meeting for explanation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will join 12:00 video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, offline training, video meeting, visit
